freeAndOpenSource.title: Free and open source
freeAndOpenSource.description: This app is provided for free and the source code is available on GitHub.

privacyFocused.title: Privacy focused
privacyFocused.description: No tracking, no cookies, no bullshit. All your data is stored locally.

bestExperience.title: Best experience
bestExperience.description: Crafted with love and care to provide the best experience possible.

translation.title: Title
translation.youAreChatGPT: You are ChatGPT, a large language model trained by OpenAI.

translation.confirmDeleteChats: Are you sure you want to delete your chats?

translation.APIKeyStoredLocally: The API Key is stored locally on your browser and never sent anywhere else.
